name: Cradle (itch) (Liam Cooke)
description:
Explore a deserted place far from Earth.

Made by Liam Cooke for Fermi Paradox Jam.

This was my first committed effort to make and release a game. I developed it over two days after spending a week learning Unity and making prototypes.

This game can be downloaded for Windows, macOS, and Linux.

The soundtrack is available for a small donation; it can also be found on Bandcamp, Spotify, iTunes and elsewhere. It contains two tracks: the original game music, and an unused track from an earlier prototype.
